backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the addition of an MSc Systems Engineering entry to the Education component, positioned at the top of the education list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files describing their purpose and functionality in the portfolio application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the application's design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with basic meta tags and root div for mounting the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the complete portfolio layout by composing all section components from HeroSection through Footer.
frontend/src/components/CertificateModal: Empty file intended for a modal component to display certification images in full-screen view.
frontend/src/components/CertificationsGa: Empty file intended for a gallery component to display certification images in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/CoreCompetencies: Displays nine technical competencies in a responsive grid with icons, including project management, AutoCAD, cybersecurity, data analytics, and networking skills.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Renders four education entries in reverse chronological order, with MSc Systems Engineering (2026, In View) at the top, followed by B.Eng, OND, and SSCE qualifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright information and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with gradient background, profile image, engineer's name and credentials, contact information, and a download CV button.
frontend/src/components/Interests.tsx: Displays five personal interests (Reading, Learning, Swimming, Travelling, Football) with icons in a horizontal flex layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalCert: Organizes certifications into six categories (memberships, project management, data/AI, cybersecurity, process improvement, technical courses) displayed in a two-column grid.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalExpe: Displays a timeline of professional work experiences with company names, job titles, periods, and responsibilities. Includes a visual timeline with dots and lines for desktop views.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalSumm: Renders a centered professional summary section with a brief overview of engineering expertise, skills, and professional strengths.
frontend/src/components/ResearchPapers.t: Lists research papers and publications with titles and DOI links that open in new tabs. Each paper is displayed in a card with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login, logout, and identity management using DFINITY's AuthClient. Includes provider component and status tracking for authentication flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating that the portfolio uses static content without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables using OKLCH color space for light and dark themes. Includes base styles for typography and a grid background pattern utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, and custom animations. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking version 27 of a professional portfolio website for Engr. Jerry Ebruvwiyor Osiobe. Contains architectural notes, existing features list covering hero section, summary, competencies, education, certifications, experience, publications, and interests sections with smooth scrolling navigation and timeline-based layouts.
